t: Simplicity Manufacturing Company - Wikipedia
s: February 14, 2024 - Simplicity Manufacturing Company is an American company based in Port Washington, Wisconsin that builds lawn and garden equipment under various brands. The company was founded by William J. Niederkorn in 1922, and started building walk-behind two-wheeled tractors in 1939.

t: Amazon.com: Customer Questions & Answers
s: The brand AmazonBasics is Amazon's own line of many products such as cables, mice, keyboards, etc. I do own a few of their products such as an external DVD drive and the mouse and they are pretty good. ... As far as I'm aware, Amazon does not manufacture any products sold.

t: How Amazon Steers Shoppers to Its Own Products - The New York Times
s: June 25, 2018 - Around 2009, Amazon quietly entered the private label business by offering a handful of items under a new brand called AmazonBasics.

t: Who makes AmazonBasics products? Is it actually Amazon? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 4): Most of the AmazonBasics are manufactured or rebranded from China. For most items like AmazonBasics Cordless Beard Trimmer, Amazon list the manufacturer name for e.g. Paiter China. For some of the items, Manufacturer's name only listed as AmazonBasics, China. t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.
